meanings.definition: A devil or demon in Islamic belief.
meanings.sent1: The villagers believed the shaitan was responsible for the mysterious disappearances.
meanings.sent2: The shaitan whispered dark thoughts into the man's mind.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child joked that the cat was a shaitan in disguise.
meanings.sent4: The storm raging outside seemed like a shaitan wreaking havoc.
meanings.sent5: The old tales warned of the shaitan lurking in the shadows.

meanings.sent1: The shaitan tempted the hero with promises of power.
meanings.sent2: The haunted house was said to be inhabited by a malevolent shaitan.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played the role of a shaitan, knocking over vases.
meanings.sent4: The sweet aroma of freshly baked cookies was a shaitan luring me into the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The shaitan whispered doubts into her mind, leading her astray.

meanings.sent1: The shaitan of the office always played pranks on his coworkers.
meanings.sent2: Beware of the shaitan who tries to lead you astray.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child was dubbed the little shaitan by the neighbors.
meanings.sent4: Her cunning smile revealed her inner shaitan.
meanings.sent5: The shaitan in disguise fooled everyone with his innocent facade.
